gen:link.msg:message: `SubsidiesProvided` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `Sector` is equal to `mbo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_SubsidiesProvided')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_SubsidiesProvided return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SubsidiesProvided` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `Sector` is equal to `po`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU2_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU2_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU2_SubsidiesProvided')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU2_SubsidiesProvided return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SubsidiesProvided` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `Sector` is equal to `vo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_SubsidiesProvided')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidiesProvidedBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_SubsidiesProvided return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
